Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.commongoal

Class TilesInPositionsPatternGoal

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.commongoal.CommonGoal
it.polimi.ingsw.model.commongoal.TilesInPositionsPatternGoal
public class TilesInPositionsPatternGoal extends CommonGoal
Class to represent the goal pattern with all Tiles disposed in the given positions of the Board .

  • Constructor Details

    • TilesInPositionsPatternGoal

      public TilesInPositionsPatternGoal()
      Class constructor without parameters. Builds a TilesInPositionsPatternGoal.

    • TilesInPositionsPatternGoal

      public TilesInPositionsPatternGoal(int id, int patternRepetition, CheckType type, List<List<Integer>> positions)
      Class constructor with parameters. Builds an TilesInPositionsPatternGoal with a specified type, ID, ...
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier assigned to the commonGoal card.
      patternRepetition - contains the number of times the personal goal must be completed to take the score tile.
      type - the type of check that has to be done on the considered common goal's card.
      positions - the matrix that contains 1 in positions where there must be same colour tiles, otherwise 0.

    • TilesInPositionsPatternGoal

      public TilesInPositionsPatternGoal(int id, int numberOfPatternRepetitionsRequired, CheckType type, int numberOfPlayers, List<List<Integer>> positions)
      Class constructor with parameters. Builds an TilesInPositionsPatternGoal with a specified type, ID, ... (numberOfPlayers is also considered in this version).
      Parameters:
      id - the image assigned to the commonGoal card.
      type - the type of check that has to be done on the considered common goal's card.
      numberOfPlayers - number of active players.
      positions - the matrix that contains 1 in positions where there must be same colour tiles, otherwise 0.

    • TilesInPositionsPatternGoal

      public TilesInPositionsPatternGoal(int id, int numberOfPatternRepetitionsRequired, CheckType type, List<ScoreTile> scoreTiles, List<List<Integer>> positions)
      Class constructor with parameters. Builds an TilesInPositionsPatternGoal with a specified type, ID, ... (scoreTiles list is also considered in this version).
      Parameters:
      id - the image assigned to the commonGoal card.
      type - the type of check that has to be done on the considered common goal's card.
      scoreTiles - is the list of current score tiles.
      positions - the matrix that contains 1 in positions where there must be same colour tiles, otherwise 0.

      public int numberOfPatternRepetitionInBookshelf(Bookshelf bookshelf)
      Here we search the number of pattern repetition in the player's bookshelf.
      Specified by:
      numberOfPatternRepetitionInBookshelf in class Card
      Parameters:
      bookshelf - is the selected Bookshelf.
      Returns:
      the number of repetitions of the TilesInPositionsPatternGoal.

    • getPositions

      public List<List<Integer>> getPositions()
      Getter for identifying pattern's tiles positions.
      Returns:
